item.title: Written Good
item.description: Yesterday wasn't a typical day. It was my birthday. I took a brush to the whiteboard and replaced all the TODOs with the words "Read Python," in an extra large blue custom font I'm calling 'meander.' I packed one of the python books in with a couple of others and took the train to the library. My idea of a good time really is a quiet nook and a well written book.
